reviewText: Inside Afghanistan In Kandahar, two captured Mujahedin talk about fighting in the city. The interview is intercut with film of a Mujahedin attack on an Afghan army outpost,and views of the destroyed city. We ask one of the prisoners if he still thinks he was right. We can see him thinking about how he will be punished after we leave, then he says, "Yes, we were right." A brave man.
This clip is from "The Black Tulip", the second film on the DVD. More clips from both films - "Inside Afghanistan" and "The Black Tulip" - are available on Google Video (search term, "docfilm")
